FileSystemEntryFilesystem.summary:
The read-only filesystem
property of the interface contains a
object that represents the file system on which the entry
resides.

remarks.para:
-File and Directory Entries API
-Introduction to the File and Directory Entries API
-
-

FileSystemEntryFilesystem.value:
A representing the file system on which the file or directory
described by the FileSystemEntry is located.
